alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Oswego County through 315 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fulton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Hastings, Volney, Palermo, Phoenix, Mexico, Parish, Pennellville, and Hinmansville. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 33 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
